info.title: Checkout Custom Card Payment API
info.description:
The Checkout Custom Card Cayment API allows flows for credit card tokenization in VTEX, covering profile management, card token vault operations, checkout processes, payment gateway interactions, and authentication workflows.

>⚠️This API is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Index

### Profile management

- `POST` [Create profile](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles)
- `DELETE` [Delete profile](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#delete-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles/-profileId-/personalData)
- `GET` [Get profile cards](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles/-profileId-/vcs-checkout)

### Card token vault

- `POST` [Save card token](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/card-token-vault/tokens)

### Checkout operations

- `POST` [Add items to cart](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/items)
- `POST` [Add profile data](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/attachments/clientProfileData)
- `POST` [Add payment data](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/attachments/paymentData)
- `POST` [Place order](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/transaction)

### Authentication

- `POST` [Start login](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/vtexid/pub/authentication/startlogin)
- `POST` [Validate login](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/vtexid/pub/authentication/classic/validate)

### Payment gateway

- `GET` [Get transaction details](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/transactions/-transactionId-)
- `GET` [List payments](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/transactions/-transactionId-/payments)
- `GET` [Get card](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/accounts/-accountId-)
- `POST` [Send payments](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/pub/transactions/-transactionId-/payments)

accountName.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL.

environment.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL.

post.description:
Creates a new Storefront user profile in the Profile System with personal data and addresses.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

isPJ.description: Indicates if the user is a legal entity.

receiverName.description: Name of the person receiving at this address.

isDisposable.description: Indicates if the address is disposable.

profileId.description: Unique identifier for the created profile.

post.description:
Saves a new card token to the Card Token Vault.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

firstDigits.description: First six digits of the card number.

lastDigits.description: Last four digits of the card number.

value.description: Token value.

useCvvForAuthorization.description: Indicates if CVV is required for authorization (`true`) or not (`false`).

email.description: Email address associated with the token.

id.description: Unique identifier for the saved card token.

accountName.description: Account name associated with this token.

firstDigits.description: First six digits of the card.

lastDigits.description: Last four digits of the card.

address.description: Billing address linked to the card.

value.description: Token value.

useCvvForAuthorization.description: Indicates if CVV is used for authorization.

cardTokenData.label: 01.A. Save 1 tokenized credit card via api using an external credential

post.description:
Adds items to the orderForm.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

orderItems.description: List of items to add to the cart.

salesChannel.description: Sales channel through which the order was made.

loggedIn.description: Whether the user is logged in.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates if the client is checked in at a pickup point.

storeId.description: ID of the physical store where the user is checked in, if any.

checkedInPickupPointId.description: ID of the pickup point where the client is checked in, if any.

allowManualPrice.description: Indicates if manual price is allowed.

canEditData.description: Specifies if user data can be edited before completing the purchase.

userProfileId.description: ID of the user's profile if available.

ignoreProfileData.description: Indicates if profile data should be ignored for this order.

value.description: Total value of the order (in cents).

messages.description: List of system or business messages associated with the order.

items.description: List of items in the cart.

uniqueId.description: Unique identifier for the item in the cart.

productId.description: ID of the product this SKU belongs to.

ean.description: EAN (European Article Number) for the SKU.

modalType.description: Type of modal that might be associated with the item.

parentItemIndex.description: Index for the parent item if this is a child item; otherwise, null.

parentAssemblyBinding.description: Assembly binding information for parent item if applicable.

assemblies.description: List of assemblies attached to this item.

priceValidUntil.description: Date and time until the current price is valid.

tax.description: Tax value for the item (in cents).

listPrice.description: Original price of the item (in cents) before discounts.

manualPrice.description: Manual price set for the item, if any.

manualPriceAppliedBy.description: User or system entity who applied the manual price, if any.

sellingPrice.description: Final price at which the item is being sold (in cents).

rewardValue.description: Reward value for the item (in cents, usually for loyalty or promotion).

isGift.description: Whether the item was added as a gift.

dimension.description: Dimension information for the item, if any.

offeringInfo.description: Information regarding special offerings, if any.

offeringType.description: Type of special offering, if any.

offeringTypeId.description: ID of special offering type, if any.

preSaleDate.description: Date until which the item is in pre-sale (if applicable).

productCategoryIds.description: String of IDs for the categories the product belongs to.

productCategories.description: Mapping of category IDs to names.

sellerChain.description: List of sellers in the chain for this item.

detailUrl.description: URL to the item's detail page.

components.description: Item components, if the item is a bundle.

bundleItems.description: List of bundle items related to this item.

attachments.description: List of attachments for this item.

offerings.description: List of available offerings for the item.

priceTags.description: List of price tags for the item.

measurementUnit.description: Unit used for measuring this item (e.g., 'un', 'kg').

unitMultiplier.description: Multiplier that indicates how many units each item represents.

manufacturerCode.description: Code of the manufacturer, if available.

priceDefinition.description: Price definition, including selling price and breakdown.

calculatedSellingPrice.description: Selling price calculated for the item (in cents).

total.description: Total price for the quantity (in cents).

sellingPrices.description: List with value and quantity for each price segment.

value.description: Value of the selling price for this segment (in cents).

quantity.description: Quantity of items for this price segment.

reason.description: Reason for the price, if applicable.

selectableGifts.description: List of gifts that can be selected by the user.

totalizers.description: List of totalizer objects giving a breakdown of the total order amount.

value.description: Total value this totalizer represents (in cents).

address.description: Selected shipping address, or null if not set.

logisticsInfo.description: List of logistics options for each cart item.

itemIndex.description: Index position of the item in the cart.

selectedSla.description: Selected SLA (Shipping Level Agreement) option, if any.

addressId.description: ID of the address being used for delivery.

slas.description: List of available SLAs for this item.

shipsTo.description: Countries this item can ship to (ISO 3166-1).

itemId.description: ID of the item in the order.

deliveryChannels.description: Delivery channels available for this item.

availableAddresses.description: Addresses available to select for delivery.

pickupPoints.description: List of pickup points available to select.

clientProfileData.description: Client profile data (personal details), if available.

documentType.description: Type of the document informed by the customer.

corporateName.description: Company name, if the customer is a legal entity.

tradeName.description: Trade name, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporateDocument.description: Company document, if the customer is a legal entity.

stateInscription.description: State inscription, if the customer is a legal entity.

corporatePhone.description: Company phone number, if the customer is a legal entity.

isCorporate.description: Whether the customer is a legal entity.

paymentData.description: Object containing payment information for the order.

updateStatus.description: Status of the last payment data update.

installmentOptions.description: List of installment payment options available.

paymentSystem.description: Identifier for the payment system (as string).

paymentName.description: Name of the payment, if available.

value.description: Total value for this payment method option (in cents).

installments.description: Installment options for this payment method.

items.description: Installment options for this payment method.

hasInterestRate.description: Indicates if this installment has interest.

value.description: Value per installment (in cents).

total.description: Total value across all installments (in cents).

sellerMerchantInstallments.description: Installment details for each merchant or seller.

id.description: ID of the merchant or seller.

value.description: Installment value for this merchant.

paymentSystems.description: List of all available payment systems on the store.

groupName.description: Group name for the payment system.

validator.description: Validation patterns and masks for payment details.

regex.description: Regex for payment field validation, or null.

mask.description: Mask pattern for input fields, or null.

cardCodeRegex.description: Regex for validating the card security code or null.

cardCodeMask.description: Mask for the card code input, or null.

weights.description: Weights to be used for Luhn algorithm or similar, or null.

useCvv.description: Specifies if the payment requires CVV.

useExpirationDate.description: Specifies if an expiration date is required.

useCardHolderName.description: Specifies if cardholder's name is required.

useBillingAddress.description: Specifies if a billing address is required.

stringId.description: String identifier for the payment system.

template.description: Template identifier for this payment type.

isCustom.description: Whether this is a custom payment method.

description.description: Description for the payment system, or null.

dueDate.description: Due date for deferred payments (if any).

availablePayments.description: Details for available payments, or null.

payments.description: List of payment transactions for the order.

giftCards.description: Gift cards used for payment (if any).

giftCardMessages.description: List of messages relating to gift card payment.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the card is expired.

useCvvForAuthorization.description: Indicates if CVV is required for authorization.

isCardToken.description: Indicates if this is a card token.

sellers.description: List of sellers involved in the order.

minimumOrderValue.description: Minimum value for orders from this seller (in cents).

clientPreferencesData.description: Client preferences, such as locale and opt-in status.

locale.description: Locale selected by the client (e.g. pt-BR).

optinNewsLetter.description: Whether client has opted in to newsletter.

savePersonalData.description: Whether to save client's personal data.

savePaymentData.description: Whether to allow client's payment data to be saved.

commercialConditionData.description: Commercial condition data for the order if any.

storePreferencesData.description: Preferences and settings for the store processing the order.

saveUserData.description: Flag to indicate if the user's data should be saved.

currencyCode.description: The ISO code of the store's currency.

currencyFormatInfo.description: Formatting conventions for the store's currency.

currencyDecimalDigits.description: Number of decimal digits for currency formatting.

currencyGroupSize.description: Number of digits in each group.

startsWithCurrencySymbol.description: Whether the currency symbol appears before the value.

giftRegistryData.description: Information about a gift registry if used.

openTextField.description: Open text field for notes or special instructions.

customApps.description: Customizable apps created by the store.

customFields.description: Customizable fields created by the store.

value.description: Custom field value.

itemMetadata.description: Metadata information for each item in the order.

items.description: Metadata and detail information for items.

ean.description: EAN (European Article Number) for the SKU.

detailUrl.description: URL for the product detail page.

assemblyOptions.description: Possible assembly options for the SKU.

hooksData.description: Information about hooks processed during the order.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Data on rates (discounts, promotions) and associated benefits.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List of identifiers for the applied rates and benefits.

id.description: ID of the rate and benefit identifier.

teaser.description: Teaser data for current order's benefits.

subscriptionData.description: Subscription information attached to the order, if any.

merchantContextData.description: Merchant context custom data, if any.

purchaseAgentsData.description: Data about purchase agents related to the order.

itemsOrdination.description: Metadata information on item ordination (sorting) in the order.

post.description:
Attaches client profile data to the orderForm.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

loggedIn.description: Indicates if the user is logged in.

isCheckedIn.description: Indicates if the user is checked in.

allowManualPrice.description: Indicates if manual price is allowed.

canEditData.description: Indicates if data can be edited.

ignoreProfileData.description: Indicates if profile data should be ignored.

value.description: Total value of the order.

items.description: List of items in the order.

isDisposable.description: Indicates if the address is disposable.

editable.description: Indicates if the address is editable.

isDisposable.description: Indicates if the address is disposable.

editable.description: Indicates if the address is editable.

isDisposable.description: Indicates if the address is disposable.

editable.description: Indicates if the address is editable.

isCorporate.description: Indicates if the profile is corporate.

profileCompleteOnLoading.description: Indicates if the profile is complete on loading.

profileErrorOnLoading.description: Indicates if there was an error loading the profile.

value.description: Total value assigned to this payment.

hasInterestRate.description: Indicates whether the payment has interest.

value.description: Value of the order without the interest rate. The value is shown without separating cents.

total.description: Total value of the order without separating cents. For example, $24.99 is represented `2499`.

requiresDocument.description: Indicates whether a document is required.

displayDocument.description: Indicates whether a document is shown.

requiresAuthentication.description: Indicates whether a authentication is required.

payments.description: Array with information on each payment chosen by the shopper.

value.description: Total value assigned to this payment.

referenceValue.description: Reference value used to calculate total order value with interest.

hasDefaultBillingAddress.description: Indicates whether billing address for this payment is the default address.

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the card is expired.

useCvvForAuthorization.description: Indicates if CVV is required for authorization.

isCardToken.description: Indicates if this is a card token.

optinNewsLetter.description: Indicates whether the user opted in to receive the store's newsletter (`true`) or not (`false`).

savePersonalData.description: Indicates if personal data should be saved.

savePaymentData.description: Indicates if payment data should be saved.

saveUserData.description: Indicates if user data should be saved.

startsWithCurrencySymbol.description: Indicates if starts with currency symbol.

openTextField.description: Optional field meant to hold additional information about the order. We recommend using this field for text, not data formats such as `JSON`, even if escaped. For that purpose, see [Creating customizable fields](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/customizable-fields-with-checkout-api).

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

itemsOrdination.description: Object containing information about the ordering of items within the orderForm.

criteria.description: Criteria adopted to order the items in the list.

ascending.description: Indicates whether the ordering is ascending.

value.description: Value of the order without the interest rate. The value is shown without separating cents.

total.description: Total value of the order without separating cents. For example, $24.99 is represented `2499`.

requiresDocument.description: Indicates whether a document is required.

displayDocument.description: Indicates whether a document is shown.

requiresAuthentication.description: Indicates whether a authentication is required.

payments.description: Array with information on each payment chosen by the shopper.

value.description: Total value assigned to this payment.

referenceValue.description: Reference value used to calculate total order value with interest.

hasDefaultBillingAddress.description: Indicates whether billing address for this payment is the default address.

giftCards.description: Gift card information, if it applies to the order.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the card is expired.

useCvvForAuthorization.description: Indicates if CVV is required for authorization.

isCardToken.description: Indicates if this is a card token.

optinNewsLetter.description: Indicates whether the user opted in to receive the store's newsletter (`true`) or not (`false`).

savePersonalData.description: Indicates if personal data should be saved.

savePaymentData.description: Indicates if payment data should be saved.

saveUserData.description: Indicates if user data should be saved.

startsWithCurrencySymbol.description: Indicates if starts with currency symbol.

openTextField.description: Optional field meant to hold additional information about the order. We recommend using this field for text, not data formats such as `JSON`, even if escaped. For that purpose, see [Creating customizable fields](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/customizable-fields-with-checkout-api).

items.description: List of objects containing metadata on each item in the order.

ratesAndBenefitsData.description: Information on rates and benefits that apply to the order.

rateAndBenefitsIdentifiers.description: List with rates and benefits identifiers.

teaser.description: List with rates and benefits teasers.

itemsOrdination.description: Object containing information about the ordering of items within the orderForm.

criteria.description: Criteria adopted to order the items in the list.

ascending.description: Indicates whether the ordering is ascending.

post.description:
Processes the order and creates a transaction.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint.
